tidbits.title: Rich History
tidbits.description: Iran has a rich historical legacy, with ancient civilizations, architectural wonders like Persepolis, and a significant influence on world history.

tidbits.title: Cultural Heritage
tidbits.description: The country boasts a vibrant cultural heritage seen in its art, poetry, music (such as traditional Persian music), and intricate handicrafts.

tidbits.title: Diverse Landscapes
tidbits.description: Iran features diverse landscapes, from deserts and mountains to lush forests, providing varied ecosystems and natural beauty.
